name: Hobby-for-love
description:
Submission for StartupCitiesGameJam

Theme : A WIN-WIN situation

You are a matchmaking agency: Hobby4luv.com

Your job: to match clients love seekers from both sides. Hearts give you new clients lonely souls. Beware! If a side loses all clients amazing people, it's game over! As you play, new hobbies are unlocked, making it more difficult to match clients romantic aspirants.

If you meet 'game over' you need to reload.
